content.question:
<math alttext="The figure presents a 5 column table with 1 row of data. The heading for column 1 is “x.” The heading for column 2 is “f of x.” The heading for column 3 is “f prime of x.” The heading for column 4 is “g of x.” The heading for column 5 is “g prime of x.” The data are as follows. Row 1. x is 2. f of x is 1. f prime of x is 5. g of x is 2. g prime of x is 4." display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mtable columnlines="solid" columnspacing="0.0em" columnwidth="3em 0.05em 3em 3em 3em 3em" frame="solid" framespacing="0.0em 0ex" rowlines="solid" rowspacing="0.05ex" width="auto"><mtr><mtd><mi>x</mi></mtd><mtd><mspace depth="1.0ex" height="2.5ex" width="0.0em"></mspace></mtd><mtd><mi>f</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mtd><mtd><msup><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>′</mo></mrow></msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mtd><mtd><mi>g</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mtd><mtd><msup><mrow><mi>g</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>′</mo></mrow></msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd></mtd><mtd></mtd><mtd></mtd><mtd></mtd><mtd></mtd><mtd></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mn>2</mn></mtd><mtd><mspace depth="1.0ex" height="2.5ex" width="0.0em"></mspace></mtd><mtd><mn>1</mn></mtd><mtd><mn>5</mn></mtd><mtd><mn>2</mn></mtd><mtd><mn>4</mn></mtd></mtr></mtable></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>
The table above gives the values of the differentiable functions <math alttext="f" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> and <math alttext="g" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>g</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> and their derivatives at <math alttext="x equals 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>. What is the value of <math alttext="the derivative, with respect to x, of, open parenthesis, f of x, times g of x, close parenthesis" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mo>ⅆ</mo></mrow><mrow><mo>ⅆ</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfrac><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>f</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo><mi>g</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mrow></math> at <math alttext="x equals 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> ?

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
